Verify the product image's image URL is 'product_thumbnail.jpg', load time is less than 300ms, and it is displayed centered within the card
Verify there are exactly 8 such product cards arranged in a grid

Verify the 'Email' input field is visible, has placeholder text 'your@example.com', its border is 1px solid #ced4da, input value should be empty initially, font size is 16px, padding 10px, and the accessibility label for this field is 'User email address'
Verify when the 'Email' input field is focused, the border color changes to #80bdff
Ensure the 'Confirm Delete' modal is hidden initially
Verify when displayed, the 'Confirm Delete' modal occupies 80% of the viewport width and 60% of the viewport height, is centered at x 50% and y 50%
Verify its background color is rgba(0,0,0,0.5) for the overlay
Verify the modal content has background #ffffff
Verify the close button, located at top 10px and right 10px, has an aria-label 'Close modal'
Confirm the main image's source is 'gallery_main.jpg', with natural dimensions 1200x800px and displayed size 600x400px
Verify there are 4 thumbnail images below it, each 100x70px, having a 2px solid #cccccc border
Verify the currently selected thumbnail has an active state indicated by a 2px solid #007bff border
Verify other thumbnails have 0.8 opacity
Verify the video player controls are visible on hover
Verify the 'Play' button has an aria-label 'Play video'
Verify the video is initially muted
Verify when 'Fullscreen' is activated, the video element expands to cover 100% of the screen width and height, and the muted state remains unchanged
Verify the play button's background color is rgba(0,0,0,0.6)
Check that the 'Categories' dropdown menu is hidden by default
Click the parent link
Verify the dropdown becomes visible, positioned directly below the link at top 100% and left 0, its background color is #ffffff, and it has a 1px solid #dddddd border
Verify each menu item has 10px vertical padding, type size 14px, and color #333333

Confirm the 'Success' alert message is displayed for 5 seconds, with an animation fading out its opacity from 1 to 0, its background color is #d4edda, text color #155724, has 16px padding, a border radius of 5px, and is positioned at top 20px, centered horizontally
Verify the alert box content displays 'Success: Item added to cart.'

Verify the product description text block, with the text 'High-quality leather jacket', has font family 'Open Sans', font size 15px, line height 24px, paragraph text color is #333333, and has a margin-bottom of 20px
Verify the 'Read More' link at the bottom has a color #007bff and is aligned right
Click a table row
Verify it enters a selected state, changing its background color to #e0e0e0, the text color within the selected row remains #000000, and the row has a 1px solid #cccccc border
Verify the 'Delete Selected' button, initially disabled, becomes enabled when at least one row is selected
Verify the 'Scroll to top' button is concealed when scroll position is 0

Verify it becomes visible when scroll position exceeds 300px, appearing with an opacity transition over 300ms, has a fixed position at bottom 30px, right 30px, with background color #333333, color #ffffff, and border radius 50% (circular shape)
Check the progress bar element displays an element width of 75% when the task is partially complete, its background color is #007bff, and it has a height of 8px
Verify the text label '75% Complete' has a font size 12px, color #000000, positioned above the bar, with 5px bottom margin
Confirm the user avatar image's image URL is 'avatar_user.jpg', its rendered shape is circular due to a border radius of 50%, its dimensions are 60x60px, and it has a 2px solid #cccccc border
Verify the 'Edit Profile' link adjacent to it has font size 14px and color #007bff
Verify the copyright text '© 2023 MyCompany. All rights reserved.' is visible, has text size 13px, font weight 400, and color #6c757d
Verify it is content aligned center within the footer, which has a background color #f8f9fa and 40px vertical padding
Verify the 'Privacy Policy' link has a color #007bff
Check the 'Event Date' input field has a placeholder 'YYYY-MM-DD'
Select '2023-10-26' from the calendar
Verify its value updates to '2023-10-26', the input box has a border of 1px solid #ced4da, a width of 150px, and its text size is 16px
Verify the icon next to it has an aria-label 'Open date picker'
Confirm the 'Active' tab has a background color #ffffff, text color #000000, and a bottom border of 2px solid #007bff
Verify inactive tabs have a background color #f0f0f0, text color #6c757d, and no bottom border
Verify each tab has 15px padding and font weight 500
Verify a count of 3 tabs in total
Verify the quantity input field displays a value of '1' by default
Verify the '+' and '-' buttons are enabled, each with an element width and height of 30px, and background color #e9ecef
Verify when the value reaches '10', the '+' button becomes disabled
Verify the label 'Quantity:' has an aria-label 'Select item quantity'
Ensure the ad banner image's source is 'promo_ad.gif', its load time is under 500ms, and it includes a transparent image overlay 'Limited Offer'
Verify the banner is positioned at bottom 50px, right 50px, with a width of 300px and a height of 250px, its opacity is 0.9, and it has a 5px border radius
Confirm the search results count label displays the text 'Showing 1-10 of 123 results'
Verify the '123' part has font weight 700
Verify the entire label has font size 14px, color #6c757d, is aligned left, its margin-bottom for this element is 10px, and it is positioned at x 15, y 200
